name: gaslit
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
lit by gaslight (= light that uses gas as a fuel): He lived in a two-room, gaslit flat. The author brings 1885 London to life with the sights and smells of the gaslit streets.
More examplesFewer examplesThere had previously been a plan for gaslit subway streets through which horse-drawn traffic could pass.Quite a few streets in central London, the Royal Parks and the exterior of Buckingham Palace remain gaslit.He could be found in the gaslit saloons of old New York.
